function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Indoor air pollution from building materials and products","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bio composite materials as an alternative to reduce indoor air pollutants","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nbpi may produce reactive ions and reactive oxygen species in the air, which could have unknown health effects.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nbpi has been adopted in various types of buildings, but its effectiveness in controlling the transmission of contagious diseases like coronaviruses needs to be further studied.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disinfectant fogging systems may pose a health risk if not properly regulated and applied, leading to exposure of building occupants to harmful chemicals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent implementation and maintenance of vertical greening systems may result in reduced air purification efficiency and potential structural damage to buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of hygienic flooring materials such as wood, bamboo, and cork may not be effective in preventing virus spread in indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct exposure to uv rays from germicidal sources can be harmful to human eyes and skin","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of air and surfaces in indoor environments may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of copper-incorporated construction products and elements.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High maintenance costs of copper materials.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining plastics with antimicrobial substances like copper, silver, and zinc.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inappropriate hvac systems for disinfection may lead to ineffective virus control.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation due to conflicting guidelines on co2 concentration and airflow","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature and humidity control leading to virus persistence","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in retrofitting air filtration units with hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contactless systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality and contamination hazards","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safe physical distancing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-thermal plasma technology airphx reducing viruses, bacteria, and mold by 90-99% in the air and on surfaces","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of ’contactless pathways’ to reduce covid-19 disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of green design and environmentally friendly approaches at bee’ah headquarters","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modular construction for emergency hospitals may not have effective pathogen control measures in place, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of touchless technology and automation may lead to overreliance on these systems and neglect of manual cleaning and disinfection processes, resulting in higher transmission rates of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on contactless systems may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of other important infection control measures, contributing to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 due to inadequate ventilation and airflow in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate construction techniques for emergency buildings , covid hospitals, quarantine tents","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of existing buildings into emergency centers raises potential health and safety risks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 virus in crowded places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in buildings due to poor ventilation and crowded spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on other research topics in healthy building technologies, with emphasis mainly on covid-19 and ventilation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heavy reliance on buildings for livelihood activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants linked to mental conditions and negative feelings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of spatial layout consideration impacting indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective promotion of social interactions in building design","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges to traditional design and construction approach to residential and public buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Post covid-19 architecture and the concept of healthy buildings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for covid-19 detection and prediction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of ai utilities in healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential conflicts of interest in research and publication","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of inaccurate or biased databases may result in incomplete understanding of ai’s impact on health care in lmics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-reliance on ai predictions may lead to
